argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidi.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | pncan3i.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_negsubdii | |- -u ( A - B ) = ( -u A + B ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_negcli | |- -u A e. CC |
| 5 | 2, 1 | #P_negsubi | |- ( B + -u A ) = ( B - A ) |
| 6 | 2, 4, 5 | #P_addcomli | |- ( -u A + B ) = ( B - A ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqtri | |- -u ( A - B ) = ( B - A ) |
